name: Hesperia Sant Just

reviews.text: Being a big fan of Hotwire/Priceline, I must say that they have deceived me this time, by saying "Barcelona West" I would never have thought that it would take me up to 1 hour to reach the center. The hotel is litterally next to the highway in an industrial zone, that could be anuwhere in this world, but not in....Barcelona; you really feel like you are missing out the whole action by staying that far. The transportation to the city center are really poor, you have to take a tram for around 25 minutes, which brings you to a tube station that is still not close to the center (around 10 stops to Las Rambla).
reviews.title: Ok hotel, in the outskirt of Barcelona

likes.liked: — The lcd tv and apples at the frotn desk
likes.disliked: — Turndown service, location miles from center, cleanliness of rooms

reviews.text: The hotel itself is ok; the rooms are modern with lcd screen, but the bathroom looked a little bit tired, and one day the cleaning woman didnt bring us any shampoo/shower gel...
reviews.title: Good hotel a bit far from the action

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didnt stay lots of time in the hotel, so cant comment abotu the gym or restaurant, we took lots of taxis to go to Barcelona.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.text: If its your first time, try not to go that far and stay where the action is.
reviews.title: Gorgeous hotel

reviews.text: We have just returned from an 8 night stay at this hotel, booked via Priceline for 30 UK pounds per night.
reviews.title: Good Hotel, Poor Location
